payment-list.title: Заявка на предоставление дополнительной банковской карты

message.text: Конечная дата должна быть больше либо равна начальной

payment-list.hql-query: select claim from com.rssl.phizic.business.documents.DefaultClaim claim where claim.formName = 'IssueAdditionalCardClaim' and claim.owner.id = :loginId and (:state is null or :state = '' or claim.state.code = :state) and (:fromDate is null or claim.dateCreated >= :fromDate) and (:toDate is null or claim.dateCreated <= :toDate ) and (:claimType is null or :claimType = '' or claim.formName = :claimType) and (:cardNumber is null or :cardNumber = '' or claim.attributes['card-number'].stringValue in (SELECT cardlink.number from com.rssl.phizic.business.resources.external.CardLink cardlink where cardlink.login.id=:loginId and cardlink.externalId=:cardNumber) ) and (:number is null or :number = '' or claim.id = :number) order by claim.dateCreated desc, claim.changed desc, claim.id desc
